Text: @AmazonHelp What do i have to do that i can get my refund
summary: The tone of the user in the tweet is 'Negative'.
translated_text:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to your account information. However, to get a refund on Amazon, you can follow these steps:

1. Go to the Amazon website and log in to your account.
2. Click on "Your Orders" to view your recent orders.
3. Find the order that you want to return and click on "Return or Replace Items."
4. Follow the prompts to select the reason for the return and choose whether you want a refund or a replacement.
5. Print the return label and package the item securely.
6. Drop off the package at a carrier location or schedule a pickup.

Once Amazon receives and processes your return, your refund will be issued to your original payment method. If you have any further questions or concerns, you can contact Amazon customer service for assistance.
